properties.name: security.gms.jwt.secret
properties.description: Defines the secret to be used for generating the JWT.

properties.name: security.gms.jwt.expiration
properties.description: Defines the expiration time to be used for generating the JWT.

properties.name: security.gms.jwt.token_prefix
properties.description: Defines the token prefix for receiving the JWT.

properties.name: security.gms.jwt.header
properties.description: Defines the header for receiving the JWT.

properties.name: security.gms.jwt.sign_up_url
properties.description: Defines the url for signing up the user.

properties.name: security.gms.jwt.authorities_holder
properties.description: Defines the holder for the authenticated user's authorities.
